Html:
Hi

I'm a new user of rawr, and as a Holy Light "burner" a litlle bit confused to configure rawr as i do healing. How can i change rotation because Holy Light is over 90% of my healing, so not only 47 sec in one fight.

Thx in advance for a response

There's no rotation to change; Rawr.Healadin will use Holy Light as much as it has mana available to do so. If it's showing you spending less time HLing than you expect, then you should make sure that everything is configured properly, like buffs and fight conditions.

Thx,

i understand now, with less time on a boss, i get more HL, with the real buff, much more, and so on. Now it's more realistic

a last question, what means "burst scale" and how can i deal with it

It's how much you value burst healing (compared to sustained). If your tank is dying to bursts of damage (such as Frozen Blows, for example), increase burst scale. If not, lower it. It's very subjective, based on your raid.
